__TOC__

A project of the CanadianTeam

Former project Lead: FabianRodriguez

Project Members: If you are interested in joining this project, please add your name here.

This page is part of the UbuntuInLibraries project and aims to list Canadian libraries that have accepted or are in discussion to accept Ubuntu media.

=== ISSN registration ===

As of Nov 29., 2005, we have been granted two ISSN registrations, on of them for use of CD-ROMs to be donated to Canadian libraires. Check http://wiki.ubuntu.com/ISSN. Guidelines to produce CDs using on of those ISSN numbers will soon be available. The numbers are:
# ISSN 1718-1100  Ubuntu Linux - Canadian edition (CD-ROM)
# ISSN 1718-1119  Ubuntu Linux - Canadian edition (Online)
